name: njsx
description: No-JSX: A customizable interface for creating React and React-Native components without JSX syntax.

scripts.package: npm test && rm -rf lib && babel --presets react-native src -d lib && cp -t ./lib/ ./package.json ./README.md && cd lib && npm pack && cd ..
scripts.release: npm run package && cd lib && npm publish ./ && cd ..

author: Nicol√°s Scarcella
